|rad1chip3 = Intersil;; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device is an [[Acer WarpLink 2412]].. which is a '''Gemtek''' manufactured device. :'''NWN''' FCC ID of OGD10410208.. The 10Mbit PHY is from '''Enable Semiconductor''' (which was absorbed into '''Lucent''' -> '''Agere''' -> etc). There is, unsuprisingly, no HTTP configuration interface for this device. ==Links of Interest== [http://web.archive.org/web/20011212143818/http://hawkingtech.com/products/wa210.htm Product page on Hawking's old website (via archive.org)] ==Pictures==
'''Retail Images''' File:Hawking WA210.jpg
